title: Crayon Shin-chan Movie 06: Dengeki! Buta no Hizume Daisakusen
synopsis: A full-scale action film with tastes of the "'007" series and Jackie Chan's movies. The members of the secret organization for world peace 'SML', code-named 'Oiroke' (sexual attractiveness) and 'Kinniku' (muscle), who join hands with the Nohara family and Kasukabe Defense Forces (Shinnosuke Nohara and his mates: Kazama-kun, Nene-chan, Masao-kun and Bo-chan), and fight against the evil organization 'Buta no Hizume' (Pig's Hoof), who tries to conquer the world by using a computer virus.
related_anime: ['Crayon Shin-chan Movie 07: Bakuhatsu! Onsen Wakuwaku Daikessen', 'Crayon Shin-chan', 'Crayon Shin-chan Movie 05: Ankoku Tamatama Daitsuiseki']
